welcome_message_body: Welcome to Lake Charles, where the charm of the historic downtown, delicious Cajun cuisine, and vibrant arts scene await you. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer!

restaurants.name: Pronia's Deli and Bakery
restaurants.description: Pronia's Deli and Bakery is a deli located in Lake Charles.
restaurants.address: 3021 Kirkman St (at Craft St), Lake Charles, LA 70601

restaurants.name: Tony's Pizza
restaurants.description: Tony's Pizza is a pizzeria located in Lake Charles.
restaurants.address: 335 E Prien Lake Rd (btwn Ryan St & Deaton St), Lake Charles, LA 70601

restaurants.name: Jason's Deli
restaurants.description: Jason's Deli is a food truck located in Lake Charles.
restaurants.address: 3527 Ryan St (btwn E LaGrange St & E School St), Lake Charles, LA 70605

restaurants.name: K.D.'s
restaurants.description: K.D.'s is a diner located in Lake Charles.

restaurants.name: Seafood Palace
restaurants.description: Seafood Palace is a seafood restaurant located in Lake Charles.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport is used for shipping and receiving cargo.

wifi.note: Passengers can access the airport's WiFi network for free.
